LanguageData.FullyCharged.stages.0.label: 완전히 충전됨
LanguageData.FullyCharged.stages.0.description: Energy is coursing through me. I feel splendid.
LanguageData.MechClusterRobot.stages.0.label: 메카 전초기지 물리침
LanguageData.MechClusterRobot.stages.0.description: 적대적인 메카노이드의 전초기지를 몰아냈어, ...인간들이 우리를 어떻게 생각하는지 상기시켜 주는거겠지.
LanguageData.ProsthophileNoProstheticRobot.stages.0.d: 더 원해, 더 많은 신체와 장치를 달아줘.
LanguageData.MedicalSpecialistRobot.stages.0.label: {0}에게 치료받음
LanguageData.MedicalSpecialistRobot.stages.0.descript: I received "medical aid" from the special healer of my ideoligion. I appreciate the thought.
LanguageData.StyleDesiredRobot.stages.0.label: look change desired
LanguageData.StyleDesiredRobot.stages.0.description: I would rather have a different appearance, but I'm currently not bothered by it.
LanguageData.SynthSick.stages.0.label: 메카나이트 감염
LanguageData.SynthSick.stages.0.description: 메카나이트 감염 때문에 기분이 좋지 않아.
LanguageData.ReactorNeedsSynthetic.stages.0.label: 연료 필요
LanguageData.ReactorNeedsSynthetic.stages.1.label: 연료 소진
LanguageData.ReactorNeedsSynthetic.stages.1.descripti: 내 반응로에 비축된 연료가 슬슬 떨어지고 있는데...
LanguageData.ReactorNeedsSynthetic.stages.2.label: 연료 부족
LanguageData.ReactorNeedsSynthetic.stages.2.descripti: 대부분의 연료를 소모했어. 정말 급유가 필요해.
LanguageData.ReactorNeedsSynthetic.stages.3.label: 연료 고갈
LanguageData.ReactorNeedsSynthetic.stages.3.descripti: 연료를 모두 소모했어. 내 반응로는 오래 버티지 못할거야... 이대로 죽는건가?
LanguageData.ReactorNeedsSynthetic.stages.4.label: 극심한 연료 고갈
LanguageData.ReactorNeedsSynthetic.stages.4.descripti: 거의 움직일 수가 없어, 연료말고는 아무것도 생각나지 않아. 몸의 작동이 점점 느려져가는 게 느껴져... 죽을 것 같아.
LanguageData.EnvironmentColdSynthetic.stages.0.label: chilly
LanguageData.EnvironmentColdSynthetic.stages.1.label: cold
LanguageData.EnvironmentColdSynthetic.stages.1.descri: I'm so cold, my reactor can't keep up.
LanguageData.EnvironmentColdSynthetic.stages.2.label: cracklingly cold
LanguageData.EnvironmentColdSynthetic.stages.2.descri: I can't keep myself warm. My skin is cracking. All I can think of is warming up.
LanguageData.EnvironmentColdSynthetic.stages.3.label: absolutely frozen
LanguageData.EnvironmentColdSynthetic.stages.3.descri: My skin is totally cracked, it hurts to move, I can barely speak. I need to get warm.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotSynthetic.stages.0.label: warm
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotSynthetic.stages.0.descrip: It's too hot here. I can't keep my components cool.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotSynthetic.stages.1.label: hot
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotSynthetic.stages.1.descrip: It's way too hot here. I might suffer internal damage if I stay this hot.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotSynthetic.stages.2.label: burningly hot
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotSynthetic.stages.2.descrip: I feel like I'm being cooked! I'm not sure how long my components can handle this..
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotSynthetic.stages.3.label: blistering hot
LanguageData.EnvironmentHotSynthetic.stages.3.descrip: This place is searing hot. I think my core could fry!
LanguageData.ButcheredSyntheticCorpse.stages.0.label: I shredded synthlike
LanguageData.ButcheredSyntheticCorpse.stages.0.descri: I dismantled a persona, even though it was a machine it still just feels wrong.. it looked so human.
LanguageData.SyntheticButcher.stages.0.description: Don't look at me, I'm naked!!! 'O'
